formData.title: Talk to us about Ubuntu and HPE
formData.introText: To speak about a specific project requirement, or have any questions, contact directly with Canonical Alliance Business Director - valerie.noto@canonical.com or to HPE Technology Partner Program - tam.vuong@hpe.com or HPE Certification Program - padilla@hpe.com, eddie.campbell@hpe.com

fieldsets.title: How should we get in touch?
